ygData.subject: Reduce duplication

Hi all,

I would like to create a URL canonicalization rule to reduce the
a=
mount of duplicate URL's being crawled?

I am discovering on our search pag=
e results duplicate links to the same
web page with the only difference in =
the URL's being one of the
following characters : '%'  '+' or '_'

So for e=
xample the following URL:

http://www.domain.com/templates.aspx?sportarticl=
es=3D%2f

Is crawled again even though the only difference is the '+' and t=
he web
page is identical.

http://www.domain.com/templates.aspx?sportarticl=
es=3D+2f
